title: 这是啥mod

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/spartan-weaponry 武器是斯巴达的武器
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/spartan-shields 盾牌是这个mod

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 一个材质包都能做到类似的效果，所以如果是一个视频，你可以把链接发出来
